AIGC NORTH AMERICA A professional communications company that offers exceptional integrated communications services. AIGC principals and team members are committed to providing our clients with innovative web strategies and proven solutions to complex online marketing challenges. Through the combined use of traditional marketing and management principals and progressive yet ethical use of modern technology, AIGC offers services unlike any other online marketing company. Attracting the right visitors to your site is essential to your success. AIGC skillfully maximizes online marketing strategies to attract your target audience resulting in increased brand awareness and the potential for repeat business. Online marketing strategies using search engine optimization (SEO), directory association, link building and more, when done skillfully after extensive site analysis will without a doubt increase your sites traffic. Our expertise and attention to detail yields the very best results. Title tags and metadata, descriptive yet brief yield the best results when indexed by search engines. Content is often ignored yet content is a major influence among search engines and requires detailed analysis. Successful analysis allows for optimum results
